headline: President Trump addresses world leaders—Davos CEO Brief for Wednesday, January 21, 2026
summary: WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray recaps a pivotal day at the World Economic Forum in Davos, including President Trump’s highly anticipated address to political and business leaders and the key issues shaping the global agenda.

headline: Can Vertiv's International Expansion Drive More Upside in the Stock?
summary: VRT's overseas momentum accelerates as AI demand lifts sales, expands backlog to $9.5B, and supports continued double-digit organic growth.

headline: HPE CEO: Governments Are Racing to Build Their Own AI Clouds—and They Want Them Now
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise CEO Antonio Neri speaks with WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray about why geopolitics and AI are now inseparable—and why governments are moving fast to build their own sovereign AI infrastructure.
